tit.e: Kanpyono Ontoki Kisainomiya Utaawase (Utaawase held by the Empress in the Kanpyo period)
Kanpyono Ontoki Kisainomiya Utaawase (Utaawase held by the Empress during the Kanpyo period)
tit.cmt: タイトルですので、補足を削除しました。

sen.j: 寛平御時后宮歌合（かんぴょうのおんとききさいのみやうたあわせ）は、歌合の一。1巻。
sen.e: Kanpyono Ontoki Kisainomiya Utaawase was one of the poetry competitions.
Kanpyono Ontoki Kisainomiya Utaawase a poetry competitions that consisted of one volume.
sen.cmt: combined this sentence with the one below to reduce sentence fragmentation; 1→one
sen.e: Kanpyono Ontoki Kisainomiya Uta-awase (Uta-awase held by the Empress during the Kanpyo period) was one of the poetry competitions, which consisted of one volume.
sen.cmt: 文法の修正を行いました。

sen.j: 寛平初年（889年）ころ宇多天皇の母后（光子后）班子内親王の邸でもよおされた。
sen.e: This poetry competition was held at the residence of Imperial Princess Hanshi (the empress dowager Mitsuko), mother of Emperor Uda around 889.
This poetry competition was held at around 889 at the residence of Imperial Princess Hanshi (the empress dowager Mitsuko), mother of Emperor Uda.
sen.cmt: moved location of "around 889" to read more naturally
sen.e: This poetry competition was held at around 889 at the residence of Imperial Princess Hanshi (the empress dowager Mitsuko), mother of Emperor Uda.
There were 100 poems broken down into 20 each of 5 themes including 4 seasons and love.
There were 100 poems in total, broken down into 20 for each of the 5 themes which were on love and the four seasons.
sen.cmt: rearranged sentence structure to read more naturally; changed 4→four before "seasons"
sen.e: There were 100 poems in total, broken down into 20 for each of the 5 themes which were on love and the four seasons.

sen.j: 作者は紀友則以下、当代の代表歌人十数人。
sen.e: The writers included over 10 representative poets of the time such as KI no Tomonori.

sen.j: 記録の現存する歌合としては、在民部卿家歌合についで古い。
sen.e: It was the second oldest utaawase of which the record remains in existence today after Zaiminbukyoke Utaawase (Utaawase held at Minbusho, the Ministry of Civil Affairs, during ARIWARA no Yukihira's service as the administrator).
